duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform physical labor to construct, repair, and maintain railroad tracks and associated structures.
Operate hand tools and equipment such as tie tongs, rail tongs, rail forks, shovels, and jacks.
Attach, remove, and handle track materials such as rail, ties, and ballast.
Participate in safety meetings and wear appropriate personal protective equipment.
Travel to various job sites, including those that require overnight stays and those that require short notice mobilization.
Work in inclement weather and rough terrain conditions.
